TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Paul_Kagame, title = Paul_Kagame, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Kagame} }

S.FORM: Paul Kagame I 1957 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 23 a romi'ad masofoc ci Paul Kagame, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Rwanda anini i ci Paul Kagame, patirengan a romi'ad i 2000 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 22 a romi'ad.

Paol Kagame I 1957 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 23 a romi'ad masofoc ci Paol Kagame, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Rwanda anini i ci Paol Kagame, patirengan a romi'ad i 2000 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 22 a romi'ad.
